name: Paul A Laskar, Ph.D.
resume_snippet: Paul A Laskar, Ph.D.  PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY: Approximately 24 years pharmaceutical industry experience including senior Pharmaceutical Development management positions with Herbert Laboratories (division of Allergan), Santen Inc (US subsidiary of Santen Ltd, Japan), and Dey LP.  More than 14 years of CMC development,  regulatory, and CMC project management consulting for start-ups and CROs in various sterile products, ophthalmic, respiratory, dermatological, and solid dosage forms.  Additional 8+
